item.title: Canva launches its own design model, adds new AI features to the platform
item.description: Canva is launching new features like Forms and email design, and it makes Affinity free for all users.

item.title: Bevel raises $10M Series A from General Catalyst for its AI health companion
item.description: Bevel's AI health companion unifies data from wearables and daily habits across sleep, fitness, and nutrition into personalized insights.

item.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy
